title: Sigma Stamp
summary: Sigma Stamp is a timestamping service on the Ergo blockchain. It provides a way for users to timestamp digital content and documents. The document includes links to the Sigma Stamp website and examples of how the service can be used.

qa_pairs.question: What is Sigma Stamp?
qa_pairs.answer: Sigma Stamp is a timestamping service on the Ergo blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of Sigma Stamp?
qa_pairs.answer: The purpose of Sigma Stamp is to provide a timestamping service on the Ergo blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the URL of the Sigma Stamp project?
qa_pairs.answer: The URL of the Sigma Stamp project is https://sigmastamp.ml.

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find examples of Sigma Stamp usage?
qa_pairs.answer: Examples of Sigma Stamp usage can be found at https://www.sigmastamp.ml/wiki#examples-of-sigmastamp-usage.

qa_pairs.question: What type of application is Sigma Stamp?
qa_pairs.answer: Sigma Stamp is a decentralized application (dApp) on the Ergo blockchain.

sections.heading: Sigma Stamp
sections.content:
[sigmastamp.ml](https://sigmastamp.ml) is a timestamping service on Ergo. 

See example usages of SigmaStamp project [here](https://www.sigmastamp.ml/wiki#examples-of-sigmastamp-usage).
